pageProduct.name: Optrex Refreshing Eye Drops 10ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Natural Plant Extract. Moisture Replenishing Daily Eye Care.

Refreshes and revitalises.


Driving, computer use, air conditioning or heating can make the eyes feel tired and uncomfortable.


Optrex Refreshing Eyes Drops are a moisture replenishing formula, with a natural plant extract to help eyes feel soothed, rehydrated and healthy.


Suitable for everyday use.


Optrex Refreshing Eyes Drops can be carried in a handbag or pocket.

Size: 10mL

Warnings

For external use only. Do not use while or just before wearing soft contact lenses. For any eye problems or if irritation develops with use speak to your doctor, pharmacist or optician.

IMPORTANT INFORMATION

If irritation persists, seek medical advice. This product i suitable for everyday use in children's eyes with the supervision of an adult.

Ingredients

Water, Hamamelis water, Boric acid, Glycerin, Borax and Benzalkonium chloride.

Directions

Use as follows as often as required. Tilt head backwards and gently squeeze 1 or 2 drops into each eye.

SAFETY DIRECTIONS

For external use only. Do not use while or just before wearing soft contact lenses. For any eye problems or if irritation develops with use speak to your doctor, pharmacist or optician.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Keep out of the reach of children. Discard 28 days after first opening.

Storage Temperature: Store below 25°C.
